name: Galactic Rescue (TMSIgames)
description:
Galactic Rescue is a Metroidvania game with puzzle elements set in an alien world.  You are given a map and a destination. Can you reach it?

What happened here? What are the mysterious creatures inhabiting this world and what are the protagonists looking for?

Platforms

Windows - x64

Install Instructions

Download the zip and extract; Run the GalacticRescueDemo-.exe file.

Difficulty

Easy and Normal.

Controls

We support Keyboard, Ps4 and Xbox controllers. We have tested Keyboard and Ps4, but we recently saw issues in the Xbox controller.

The game has been hand-crafted with patience and care to provide the best experience possible.

We hope you enjoy it!

---

Features not present in demo, but that we want to support in the game

- Ability to rebind keys and buttons.

- Ability to save progress.

Issues

- Was reported an issue with the extra wide screen... we are planning for fix the issue soon! thanks for understanding!

- Xbox controller has shown issues that we will try to fix.

- An issue has been observed at the end of the game: if you choose "Reload Checkpoint" from the main menu, the game will continuously (and erroneously), kill the Player. This only happens at the end of the game and it should be safe to "Reload Checkpoint" elsewhere. We will fix this in next version of the demo.
